About Me

As a highly motivated and detail-oriented software developer, I bring a unique blend of technical expertise, creative problem-solving, and a strong passion for innovation. My journey in the tech industry began with a focus on Java development, where I honed my skills in designing and building efficient, scalable applications. Over time, I expanded my expertise to include modern technologies like React, Express.js, and MongoDB, enabling me to create full-stack solutions that deliver exceptional user experiences.


Driven by curiosity and a love for learning, I have delved into fields such as machine learning and convolutional neural networks, mastering tools like PyTorch and NumPy. I thrive in dynamic environments where I can contribute to challenging projects, collaborate with like-minded professionals, and grow both personally and professionally.

Neural Network from scratch

In a personal project, I built a neural network from scratch to process a 2D numerical dataset, leveraging only Python and foundational libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib. This endeavor involved implementing essential neural network components, including forward propagation, backpropagation, and gradient descent, without relying on high-level frameworks. I utilized Pandas for data manipulation and preprocessing, NumPy for efficient matrix operations, and Matplotlib to visualize learning curves and model performance metrics. By carefully tuning hyperparameters and debugging computations at every step, I achieved a deeper understanding of how neural networks function at their core. This project not only enhanced my programming and mathematical skills but also demonstrated my ability to independently develop complex AI systems from the ground up.

Python NumPy Matplotlib Scikit

Telegram Finance Bot

I developed a Telegram Finance Bot Tracker designed to assist investors in monitoring financial statistics, such as share prices and company information, for their selected companies. This bot allows users to customize updates at various frequencies, such as hourly, daily, or weekly, catering to their individual needs. Leveraging the Python Telegram Bot library, I created an intuitive interface for seamless user interaction. Selenium was utilized for web scraping, ensuring real-time data collection, while Yahoo Finance served as the primary source for accurate and comprehensive financial information. This project honed my skills in API integration, data scraping, and automation, and it showcases my ability to build practical, user-focused solutions for real-world applications.

Python Python Telegram Bot Selenium Yahoo Finance Python

Project title

I developed a user-friendly mobile app using Flutter that integrates a range of essential features for a seamless experience. The app allows users to sign in and log in with Google and Apple ID, providing smooth authentication using Firebase Authentication. For backend and data management, I utilized Google Firebase and Firestore services, ensuring secure and scalable storage solutions. The app supports both dark and light mode, allowing users to switch between them for personalized viewing preferences. Additionally, I implemented a chatting feature, enabling users to engage in real-time conversations, with messages saved in Firebase using a well-structured schema. A dedicated user page displays a comprehensive list of users, enhancing interactivity and community-building. This project strengthened my expertise in Flutter development, Firebase integration, and real-time data handling, while also showcasing my ability to create robust, scalable mobile applications.

Dart Flutter Google Firebase Google Firestore
